scripts.stop: docker-compose stop backend && docker-compose stop frontend && docker-compose rm -fsv frontend backend
scripts.stop-database: docker-compose stop mysql-server adminer && docker-compose rm -fsv mysql-server adminer
scripts.init-database: docker exec -it mysql-server mysql -uroot -ppassword -e "ALTER USER 'root'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'password';CREATE USER IF NOT EXISTS 'root'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY 'password';GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON *.* TO 'root'@'%' WITH GRANT OPTION;ALTER USER 'root'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED WITH mysql_native_password BY 'password';ALTER USER 'root'@'%' IDENTIFIED WITH mysql_native_password BY 'password';CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS ma_base;"
scripts.stop-backend: docker-compose stop backend && docker-compose rm -fsv backend
scripts.stop-frontend: docker-compose stop frontend && docker-compose rm -fsv frontend
